text: Elvis Okello Bwomono (born 29 November 1998) is an Ugandan footballer who plays as a full-back for club Southend United. ==Club career== Bwomono was born in Uganda and lived there until the age of three. Bwomomo later moved to London where he attended Hatch End High School. He started his career as a youth player at Queens Park Rangers, and he later joined Southend United as a 14-year old. He made his debut for Southend in a 2–1 defeat to Gillingham in the 2017–18 EFL Trophy Southern Section Group B fixture on 29 August 2017.
